#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, i, k, n;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	cin.ignore();
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		string str1, str2, str3;
		
		getline( cin, str1 );
		getline( cin, str2 );
		
		str3 = str1 + str1;
		n = str3.length();
		
		k = str3.find( str2 );
		
		if( ( k >= 0 ) && ( k < n ) )
			printf("YES\n");
		else
			printf("NO\n");
		
		str1.clear();
		str2.clear();
		str3.clear();
		
	}
	return 0;
}
